mapper.insert: insert into tb_k3_stk_miscellaneous ( fid, fbilltypeid, fbillno, fstockorgid, fstockdirect, fsupplierid, facceptance, fdeptid, fcurrencyid, fbasecurrid, fexchangetypeid, fexchangerate, fdate, fnote, fstockerid, fstockergroupid, fdocumentstatus, fcreatorid, fcreatedate, fmodifierid, fmodifydate, fapproverid, fapprovedate, fcancelstatus, fcancellerid, fcanceldate, fownertypeid, fownerid, fobjecttypeid, ftransferbiztype, tc_define_rowid, tc_erp_code, tc_erp_add_time, tc_sync_status, tc_sync_msg, tc_sync_save_time, tc_sync_submit_time, tc_sync_audit_time) values ( #{fid}, #{fbilltypeid}, #{fbillno}, #{fstockorgid}, #{fstockdirect}, #{fsupplierid}, #{facceptance}, #{fdeptid}, #{fcurrencyid}, #{fbasecurrid}, #{fexchangetypeid}, #{fexchangerate}, #{fdate}, #{fnote}, #{fstockerid}, #{fstockergroupid}, #{fdocumentstatus}, #{fcreatorid}, #{fcreatedate}, #{fmodifierid}, #{fmodifydate}, #{fapproverid}, #{fapprovedate}, #{fcancelstatus}, #{fcancellerid}, #{fcanceldate}, #{fownertypeid}, #{fownerid}, #{fobjecttypeid}, #{ftransferbiztype}, #{tcDefineRowid}, #{tcErpCode}, #{tcErpAddTime}, #{tcSyncStatus}, #{tcSyncMsg}, #{tcSyncSaveTime}, #{tcSyncSubmitTime}, #{tcSyncAuditTime})
mapper.update: update tb_k3_stk_miscellaneous set fid = #{fid}, fbilltypeid = #{fbilltypeid}, fbillno = #{fbillno}, fstockorgid = #{fstockorgid}, fstockdirect = #{fstockdirect}, fsupplierid = #{fsupplierid}, facceptance = #{facceptance}, fdeptid = #{fdeptid}, fcurrencyid = #{fcurrencyid}, fbasecurrid = #{fbasecurrid}, fexchangetypeid = #{fexchangetypeid}, fexchangerate = #{fexchangerate}, fdate = #{fdate}, fnote = #{fnote}, fstockerid = #{fstockerid}, fstockergroupid = #{fstockergroupid}, fdocumentstatus = #{fdocumentstatus}, fcreatorid = #{fcreatorid}, fcreatedate = #{fcreatedate}, fmodifierid = #{fmodifierid}, fmodifydate = #{fmodifydate}, fapproverid = #{fapproverid}, fapprovedate = #{fapprovedate}, fcancelstatus = #{fcancelstatus}, fcancellerid = #{fcancellerid}, fcanceldate = #{fcanceldate}, fownertypeid = #{fownertypeid}, fownerid = #{fownerid}, fobjecttypeid = #{fobjecttypeid}, ftransferbiztype = #{ftransferbiztype}, tc_erp_code = #{tcErpCode}, tc_erp_add_time = to_date(#{tcErpAddTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), tc_sync_status = #{tcSyncStatus}, tc_sync_msg = #{tcSyncMsg}, tc_sync_save_time = to_date(#{tcSyncSaveTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), tc_sync_submit_time = to_date(#{tcSyncSubmitTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), tc_sync_audit_time = to_date(#{tcSyncAuditTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where tc_define_rowid = #{tcDefineRowid}
mapper.sql: t.fid, t.fbilltypeid, t.fbillno, t.fstockorgid, t.fstockdirect, t.fsupplierid, t.facceptance, t.fdeptid, t.fcurrencyid, t.fbasecurrid, t.fexchangetypeid, t.fexchangerate, t.fdate, t.fnote, t.fstockerid, t.fstockergroupid, t.fdocumentstatus, t.fcreatorid, t.fcreatedate, t.fmodifierid, t.fmodifydate, t.fapproverid, t.fapprovedate, t.fcancelstatus, t.fcancellerid, t.fcanceldate, t.fownertypeid, t.fownerid, t.fobjecttypeid, t.ftransferbiztype, t.tc_define_rowid, t.tc_erp_code, to_char(t.tc_erp_add_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_erp_add_time, t.tc_sync_status, t.tc_sync_msg, to_char(t.tc_sync_save_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_sync_save_time, to_char(t.tc_sync_submit_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_sync_submit_time, to_char(t.tc_sync_audit_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_sync_audit_time

t1.fentryid, t1.fid as t1_fid, t1.fseq, t1.fmaterialid, t1.flot, t1.flot_text, t1.fstockid, t1.fstocklocid, t1.funitid, t1.fqty, t1.fjoinqty, t1.fprice, t1.famount, t1.fbomid, t1.fauxpropid, t1.fproducedate, t1.fexpirydate, t1.fmtono, t1.fprojectno, t1.fstockstatusid, t1.fbaseunitid, t1.fbaseqty, t1.fjoinbaseqty, t1.fsecunitid, t1.fsecqty, t1.fextauxunitid, t1.fextauxunitqty, t1.fownertypeid as t1_fownertypeid, t1.fownerid as t1_fownerid, t1.fkeepertypeid, t1.fkeeperid, t1.fdismountcostrate, t1.fstockflag, t1.fnote as t1_fnote, t1.fsnunitid, t1.fsnqty, t1.fjoinsecqty, t1.tc_define_rowid as t1_tc_define_rowid

choose.otherwise:
select tt.* from ( select from tb_k3_stk_miscellaneous t
) tt
